name: Crayon Roll for your Budding Artist
description:
Can be either boy or girl fabrics to customize for your little artist.

The perfect takealong item for your little girl. Toss this into your purse or diaper bag and your little girl will always have something to do! 

This crayon roll holds your favorite 14 crayons. 14 Crayola Crayons included.

The outside of the crayon roll has blue fabric with bright colored large polkadots, the inside has hot pink and light green/white polkadot fabric. The fabric roll rolls up and closes with an elastic band and a handsewn button to keep it closed. The pink fabric has vinyl heat-set on it to ensure that it stays clean as the crayons go in and out of the roll.

Price includes shipping.

name: Minnie Mouse Dress - Perfect for your Disney Vacation!
description:
I made my daughter this dress when we went to Florida for her first trip to Disney. It was perfect for our day to meet Mickey & Minnie. 

It has Minnie ears appliqued on the lower right side and has eyelet lace at the bottom. The dress can be made in any size between 6 months and 24 mos/2T

The dress is red with white polkadots and is an adorable dress whether spending the day at Disney or to show your love of Classic Disney. This would also be a perfect little dress for a Halloween costume!

Price includes shipping

name: Personalized Tag for Sippy Cup/Bottle/Coffee Cup
description:
Personalized Tag - fits many different cup sizes - coffee cups, sippy cups, bottles. 

Tags are machine embroidered with name on grosgrain ribbon which wraps around the bottle or sippy or cup and closes with a handsewn button and coordinating elastic.

These are perfect for keeping your child's sippy cup or bottle from being mixed up at the church nursery, playdates, or daycare. Also great for the office, for the coffeehouse, and on-the-go. Easily removable and extra adorable!

You will receive TWO high quality sippy tag with your child's name. Please indicate spelling of name and if you prefer boy or girl colored tags.

I started making these after my sippy cups and bottles came home with my kid's names written in Sharpie from the church nursery. These are fun, personalized simple tags that wrap around your bottle or sippy cup and save them from the fate of the Sharpie!

Review: I love my personalized bottle tags. My son has been using them since he was born and now he is 7 months old. I now put them on his sippy cups and they work great! I recommend them to everyone and have purchased some for a gift too! - Erin G.

Price includes shipping.
